title: Fifty-four forty south
brief_description: A New Zealand naval vessel takes meteorologists and scientific observers to the Campbell and Macquarie Islands in the South Polar Seas. Nature interest of bird and animal life - albatrosses, penguins, sea lions and sea elephants.
description: A New Zealand naval vessel takes meteorologists and scientific observers to the Campbell and Macquarie Islands in the South Polar Seas. Nature interest of bird and animal life - albatrosses, penguins, sea lions and sea elephants.
